-- 1) new database
CREATE DATABASE Sales
  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;
GO;

Use Sales;
GO;
-- 2) scoped creds (if needed)
    -- if not authenticated with Synapse

-- 3) new data source
-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE sales_data
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE sales_data WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://datalake9nlosdj.dfs.core.windows.net/files/dp-203/Allfiles/labs/02/data/'
);
GO;

-- 4) file format

    -- csv format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS(
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
        )
    );
GO;

    -- parquet format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    );
GO;


-- 5) external table
-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.orders

    -- csv 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.orders
(
    SalesOrderNumber VARCHAR(10),
    SalesOrderLineNumber INT,
    OrderDate DATE,
    CustomerName VARCHAR(25),
    EmailAddress VARCHAR(50),
    Item VARCHAR(30),
    Quantity INT,
    UnitPrice DECIMAL(18,2),
    TaxAmount DECIMAL (18,2)
)
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE =sales_data,
    LOCATION = '*.csv',
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormat
);
GO

    -- parquet
-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ordersParquet
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ordersParquet
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE =sales_data,
    LOCATION = '*.parquet',
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
);
GO

-- query external table
SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[orders]

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[ordersParquet]

SELECT YEAR(OrderDate) AS OrderYear,
        MONTH(OrderDate) AS OrderMonth,
        SUM(Quantity) Quantity,
       SUM((UnitPrice * Quantity) + TaxAmount) AS GrossRevenue
FROM dbo.orders
GROUP BY YEAR(OrderDate), MONTH(OrderDate)
ORDER BY OrderYear, OrderMonth;

-- **********************
-- keep things neat in a stored procedure
USE Sales;
GO;

DROP PROCEDURE sp_GetYearlySales

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_GetYearlySales
AS
BEGIN
    -- drop existing table
    IF EXISTS (
            SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables
            WHERE name = 'YearlySalesTotals'
        )
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE YearlySalesTotals
    -- create external table
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE YearlySalesTotals
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'yearlysales/',
            DATA_SOURCE = external_table_data,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
        )
    AS
    SELECT YEAR(OrderDate) AS CalendarYear,
            SUM(Quantity) AS ItemsSold,
            ROUND(SUM(UnitPrice) - SUM(TaxAmount), 2) AS NetRevenue
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK '*.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'lab_03_data',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        ) AS orders
    GROUP BY YEAR(OrderDate)
END

EXEC sp_GetYearlySales;

SELECT * FROM dbo.YearlySalesTotals
